name: Abjuration
description: Encompasses protective spells, though some have aggressive uses. Can create magical barriers, negate magical or physical abilities, harm trespassers, or even banish to another plane.

name: Calling
description: Takes creatures from their natural planes and brings them to the caster.

name: Charm
description: The target of the spell believes someone has a good relationship with them, such as believing an enemy is a friend.

name: Compulsion
description: Force the target to do something beyond their natural will.

name: Conjuration
description: Calls materials, creatures, or energy to the caster or could be reversed to cause the opposite effect, possibly over long distances, or from another plane of existence.

name: Creation
description: Manipulates matter itself to create an object or creature, often requiring further magic to hold the creation together afterwards.

name: Divination
description: Allows the caster to see things that are not normally visible, or a great distance away.

name: Enchantment
description: The power to manipulate the minds of others.

name: Evocation
description: Manipulate energy or tap an unseen source of power to produce something from nothing. Often used to cause large amounts of damage.

name: Figment
description: Creates an image or sound of something htat isn't there.

name: Glamer
description: A spell with the ability to fool any of the senses, or make creatures or objects appear or disappear.

name: Healing
description: Channels positive energy to heal the wounds of creatures or damage of the undead. Powerful healing magic can call dead creatures back from the Fugue Plane.

name: Illusion
description: The ability to deceive the minds of others, making them believe they are seeing or hearing things that are not there, or remembering things that never happened.

name: Necromancy
description: The Dark Art, manipulating the energy of the dead, to extend life, drain life from others, or create undead.

name: Pattern
description: Alter the mind of a perceiver, often with negative effects.

name: Phantasm
description: Cast a personal mental image into the mind of another, making them believe they are witnessing something that is not true.

name: Scrying
description: Create an invisible sensor to perceive the world and transmit that information back to the caster.

name: Shadow
description: A part-illusion, part-reality spell that can affect the world around it for real.

name: Summoning
description: Brings an object or creature from one location to the caster. Usually results in the object or creature being returned to its original location once the spell ends.

name: Teleportation
description: Transports the subject(s) over (usually a great) distance, normally via the Astral Plane. Although usually both the origin and destination are on the Material Plane, powerful spells can teleport between planes.

name: Transmutation
description: Change the physical properties of creatures or objects. Formerly known as alteration.
